about.title: About Me ü§î
about.description: Graduated in Computer Science by the UPV, seeking to grow as a professional in the field of software development and front-end and back-end technologies. Related to frameworks like Next, Angular and front-end libraries (React). Worked with back-end frameworks in PHP (Symphony) in projects focused on retail and transaction monitoring in large surfaces.
about.personal: When I'm not programming, I like to go to the gym, play video games (especially strategy ones) or listen to music.

experiences.description: Developer of software products for individuals and web designer

content.paragraph: While working full-time, I dedicate myself to creating software products, web pages and applications for individuals who want to advertise themselves, offer their services or simply have an online presence. My main clients are...
list: Individuals who need an online presence through a portfolio. Artists, models, professionals...
Private tutors through a platform that allows them to organize their teaching schedules and publish content for their students in the form of a blog.

experiences.position: Full-Stack Developer in an online ticketing company
experiences.description: Development, maintenance and implementation of code for the ERP of an online ticketing company.

content.paragraph: In Universal Tickets S.L, the cradle of Servientradas, I have been able to grow as a professional developing code in Javascript, HTML, CSS and PHP, in a robust system with years of experience and with the hand of experienced professionals in the ticketing and entertainment industry. Among the things I have been in charge of, we highlight...
list: Custom design of web pages. At the request of the client and their needs, a design is created according to their objectives.
Integration of third-party services: Integration of an external ticket sales service, adapting the responses of its API to our system.

experiences.description: My experience at F1 Connecting has been key to developing myself as a front-end developer and technical support professional.

content.paragraph: I have had the opportunity to participate in three different projects, each with its own focus and level of responsibility:
list: Technical Support in Carrefour TPVs (2023 - 2024): attention and resolution of incidents in point-of-sale systems.
Developer in retail management solution (2024): creation of functional interfaces and design of user flows.
Front-End Developer in payment monitoring system (2024 - 2025): development of user interfaces and performance optimization.

experiences.description: My first contact with the working world allowed me to learn to work in a team and develop soft skills.

content.paragraph: During my time at LaCuesta Grup, I learned to handle the composure at key moments of the day and to treat people kindly regardless of the situation. Among other skills, I developed...
list: Patience, understanding and ease of speaking with customers.
Teamwork and collaboration with other waiters.
Social skills. Reinforcement of languages with foreign clients.

items.title: TutorGo, a tool for private tutors and professionals
items.description: Platform for managing tutoring and online courses, with content management features.
content: <0>TutorGo</0> is a platform for managing tutoring and online courses, designed for private tutors and professionals who want to digitize and organize their educational offer.
It allows creating, organizing and controlling tutoring sessions, managing schedules, students and educational materials in an efficient way.
It offers tools for planning online or in-person courses in an intuitive way and optimizing the time of tutors.
<1>Complete management of educational content, students and sessions</1>, including materials, attendance and progress tracking.
Integration with AWS services for storage, security and scalable deployment, ensuring reliability and performance.

items.title: Pinpoint, the free event platform
items.description: Free event platform, accessible and with social network features on a global map.
content: <0>Pinpoint</0> is a web platform that allows users to create, share and explore events and itineraries through geolocalized control points on an interactive map.
Each control point can include multimedia information, QR codes and additional details, making the user experience richer and more complete.
<1>Highlighted features:</1> creation of public or private events, registration management, customized visibility and notifications.
Implemented with Next.js and React, integrating internationalization (i18n) and user-centered design to simplify navigation and event discovery.

items.title: Various games and small projects
items.description: Various personal projects and games that allow me to apply my skills in different contexts of programming.
content: <0>This repository</0> includes various personal projects that allow me to apply my skills in different contexts, from compilers to games and graphic simulations.
Among them are a compiler for a subset of the C language, Wikipedia scraping tools, interactive visualizations of fractal sets and Turing machine simulators.
There are also implementations of classic games, such as Snake and Brick Breaker, which helped me practice graphical interfaces, game logic and animations.

<1>These projects</1> not only reinforced my technical knowledge in programming, data structures and algorithms, but also provided an excellent opportunity to experiment with interactive visualizations and creating engaging user experiences.

items.title: Up And Down English
items.description: Website for an English language academy.
content: <0>Up And Down English</0> is a website for an English language academy, designed for students of different levels.
Developed with Next.js and React, it offers an intuitive and scalable user interface.
The features include customized course creation, student management, grades and notifications.
It also includes authentication and authorization features, and uses libraries like React Hook Form to handle forms and React Query to handle data caching.
